content.description:
Follow the line of bolts just right of the large bush about 1/3 the way up the route.

This is the easiest approach pitch to Jail House Wall.  Pull onto the large ledge and walk/scramble 50 feet left to the base of the routes on Jail House Wall.
content.location: Right of Lone Ranger.  Easily identified as the route than skirts the large bush on the cliff on the right side.

content.description: Right of Red Shank, climb past 1 bolt to the ledge.  Continue up the face of a column towward a corner system.  Finish at the top anchors in a large roof.
content.location: Just to the right of Red Shank.  Right most route on Rubble Wall.  Puppy Chow and Double Dog Dare share the first 3 bolts.

content.description:
Bolt line up a narrow pillar feature left of a large bush.  Climb left of the pillar between the 3rd and 4th bolts then hand traverse right at the 6th bolt to the right side of the pillar.  Follow the corner/bolts to the top anchors.

Original route is rated 11b if stay on the pillar and avoid both corners on either side of the pillar..
Clip the first 3 bolts of Puppy Chow then move right and up.  Continue over a hard bulge clipping 4 more bolts along the way.
content.location: Right most route on Rubble Wall.  Puppy Chow and Double Dog Dare share the first 3 bolts.

content.description: Start in a nice corner and move past two bolts to a ledge.  Continue up a dihedral to a fractured face of fine brown rock.  Finish by stemming a wide corner to the top anchors.
content.location: Leftmost route on the Rubble Wall.
